# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new LookAround view controller object from a coder object provided by a storyboard or nib file.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoder] object

## Creating a LookAround controller

- **init(nibName:bundle:)**: Creates a new LookAround view controller from the specified nib and bundle.
- **init(scene:)**: Creates a new LookAround view controller with the specified scene.
